Name: Pizza Joint
Description: Get 1 Coin from the player who rolled this dice.

Name: Family Restaurant
Description: Get 2 Coin from the player who rolled this dice.

Name: Members-Only Club
Description: Get all Money from player who rolled this if they have 3 or more landmarks

Name: Mackerel Boat
Description: Get 3 Coin if you have a harbor.

Name: Apple Orchard
Description: Get 3 Coins from the bank on anyone's turn

Name: Tuna Boat
Description: Roll 2 die and get that many coins.

Name: Cheese Factory
Description: Get 3 coin for each ranch owned

Name: Furniture Factory
Description: Get 3 coins for each forest owned

Name: Moving company
Description: Give a non purple to another player and receive 4 coins from bank.

Name: Soda Bottling Plant
Description: Get 1 Coin from bank for every Red owned by all players.

Name: Fruit and Vegetable Market
Description: Get 2 Coins for each plant you own.

Name: Stadium
Description: Get 2 Coins from each player.

Name: Business Center
Description: Trade one non-purple with another player for a non-purple

Name: Publisher
Description: Get 1 Coin from each player for every Cup and Bread they own.

Name: Tax Office
Description: For each play who has 10 or more, take half (round down).

Name: Tech-Startup
Description: At the end of turn place one coin in and if activated take the amount invested from each player.

Name: General Store
Description: If you have les than 2 constructed landmarks get 2 coins from the bank on your turn only.

Name: Bakery
Description: Get 1 coin from the bank, on your turn only.

Name: Demolition Company
Description: If possible, you must demolish one of your constructed landmarks by turning it back over to its unconstructed side. When you do, get 8 coins from the bank on your turn only.

Name: Flower Shop
Description: Get 1 coin from the bank for each flower orchard you own, on your turn only.

Name: Wheat Field
Description: Get 1 coin from the bank, on anyone's turn.

Name: Ranch
Description: Get 1 coin from the bank, on anyone's turn.

Name: Flower Orchard
Description: Get 1 coin from the bank, on anyone's turn.

Name: Forest
Description: Get 1 coin from the bank, on anyone's turn.

Name: Sushi Bar
Description: If you have a harbor, you get 3 coins from the player who rolled the dice.

Name: Café
Description: Get 1 Coin from the player who rolled this dice.

Name: French Restaurant
Description: If the player who rolled this number has 2 or more constructed landmarks, get 5 coins from the player who rolled the dice.
